channel.title: Special attack bar
channel.description:
Revision : 317 PI i made custom special attack potions that restore 50% each dose. but when I drink it, it lets me use the special attack but the green bar does not change/update. here's a pic to show what I mean...
right now i'm using the "updateSpecialBar" method in ItemAssistant.java to update it. and this is what it does. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zp7eC3d.png[/img] anybody know how to make it update the green part too?
